name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What the Hell is My IP Address?

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays public IP and geolocation in the badge and popup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily view your public IP address and geolocation details with this lightweight Chrome extension!

🌍 Country Flag in Toolbar: Displays the country flag of your current IP address directly in the Chrome toolbar for quick reference.
🔎 Detailed Information: Click the extension icon to see your full public IP address, ISP, location (city, region, country), and ASN.
🔄 Auto Refresh: Updates every 5 minutes to ensure the information is always up to date.
⚡ Fast and Secure: No API tokens or complex setup required.
Perfect for developers, travelers, or anyone curious about their network location! 🚀

Key Features:

Displays public IP address and geolocation.
Shows the country flag for easy identification.
Updates data automatically every 300 seconds.
Provides ISP and Autonomous System (ASN) information.
Lightweight and privacy-focused—no personal data is stored.
